author: TaiSakuma
body:
This PR deletes _calotoweroptmaker_, which was an alternative to _towerMaker_ and used as the inputs to a set of optimized caloMETs.

The names of the optimized caloMETs started with "metOpt". These were event contents of RECO and were discontinued at CMSSW_6_1_X:
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/physics-validation/1913.html
title: delete "calotoweroptmaker"
